entry.title: DHT - Kademlia
entry.content:
BitTorrent uses a Distributed sloppy hash table for storing peer contact information for trackerless torrents.

Protect data and communication, remove single point of failure, handle failure automatically by replicating data and enforce cooperation of nodes with self managing decentralized consensus

General Problem

How to store data reliably and efficiently and privately on everybody's computer so that the internet will scale upto internet size

Distributed System Literature

  • Unstructured p2p system (adhoc)
  • Structured (safe network)

Structured Network

  • uniform ID space
  • all node talk amond themseslf to maintain overall organization of connection and data ownership
  • Closeness: Which machine store which file (eucledian distance, bitwise_xor)
